entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 3 April 2023
